I'm writing a class (extending TestCase) which tests an object I get
from a=
 factory method.  The first test method asks the Factory for the
object and=
 subsequent tests methods exercise the returned object.

If any method fail=
s, I know all the remaing ones will fail.  How can I
prevent the subsequent=
 tests from being run?  (I assume the test
methods are invoked in the order=
 the appear in the TestCase.)

Thanks in advance.

Jim Cant
